GSD.description:
scsi: target: iscsi: Make sure the np under each tpg is unique

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.302 by commit 2953394b3129aaf5df3b61918ea2570ff878a7b8. For more details please see the references link.
